name: MonKlinK
description:
Two monkeys suffered as test animals for experiments, as a side effect if they are too far away from each other their minds are disconnected and they cannot move. At this point they have escaped from the lab into the jungle, but things get difficult because they have to coordinate to avoid obstacles.

Sprite Assets:

  • Pixel Jungle Monkey Platformer (Beginner Friendly) for PixelSym. https://pixelsym.itch.io/pixel-jungle-monkey-platformer-beginner-friendly

Sounds:

  • SoundTrack: At Least It Is by Mid-Air Machine. Free Music Archive: Mid-Air Machine - At Least It Is
  • Jump: Jumping SFX by Lefty_Studios. Freesound - "Jumping SFX" by Lefty_Studios
  •  Damage: 8 bit damage sound by EVRetro. Freesound - "8-bit damage sound.wav" by EVRetro

Developers: 

  • Diego Chacón.
  • Yeudi Martínez.
  • Fernando Miranda.
  • Rodolfo Rojas.
